definition: a breed of horse/variant of 歡|欢[huan1]
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: In an atmosphere of joy, new and old friends celebrated the Chinese traditional festival together.
sentences.chinese: 在欢乐的气氛中，新朋老友一起欢度中国的传统佳节。

sentences.english: He likes to drink, have a good time, and tell everyone how wonderful he is.
sentences.chinese: 他开怀畅饮，欢度每一刻，告诉每个人他有多棒。

sentences.english: It depicts the people to celebrate the Spring Festival grand festival scene.
sentences.chinese: 描绘了我国人民欢度春节盛大的喜庆情景。

sentences.english: The city has been painted up for the Spring Festival.
sentences.chinese: 为欢度春节市容已修饰一新。

sentences.english: No word on how the first famliy plans to spent New Year’s Eve tonight.
sentences.chinese: 没人知道第一家庭今晚计划如何欢度新年前夜。

sentences.english: Yang-ge dancing is a necessity of celebrating holidays.
sentences.chinese: 扭秧歌是欢度节日的必备节目。

sentences.english: We celebrated the joyous Mid-Autumn Festival.
Each year, Canada's neational capital. Ottawa, celebrates the spirit of winter with Winterlude.
sentences.chinese: 每年，加拿大首都渥太华都举办冰雪节来欢度冬天。

sentences.english: They celebrated the festival by holding a party.
sentences.chinese: 他们是以举行宴会的方式欢度该节日的。

sentences.english: To walk, and pass our long Loves Day.
sentences.chinese: 去散步，把悠长的恋爱日欢度。

sentences.english: The Nerazzurri ambassador spent nearly an hour with his 'admirers'.
sentences.chinese: 蓝黑大使与球迷们欢度了大约一个小时。

sentences.english: In the past one month, i was staying with my parents and enjoying the spring festival in my hometown.
sentences.chinese: 在刚刚过去的这个月中，我同爸爸妈妈一起欢度春节。

sentences.english: Muslims here and around the world began celebrating Eid al-Adha, or the Feast of the Sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 本地和全世界的穆斯林欢度古尔邦节，即宰牲节。

sentences.english: But belief in the supernatural is not required to enjoy Halloween.
sentences.chinese: 但欢度万圣节可不一定要信鬼。

sentences.english: Burning fireworks is one of the most typical customs that people do during Spring Festival.
sentences.chinese: 燃烧的烟花也是最典型的欢度春节活动之一。

sentences.english: Exchanging gifts and sending Christmas cards are the modern ways of celebrating the Christmas in the orld.
sentences.chinese: 交换礼物和寄圣诞卡是欢度圣诞常见的方式。

definition: to gather happily under one roof
to celebrate a festival/after the celebrations (i.e. once the festival is over)
